EmailTemplate.name: Time/Expense Entry Instructions (1349711048.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Time/Expense Entry Instructions (1349711048.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Frank, Welcome to MBO Partners! Here are some important reminders to be aware of: - Time and expense entry instructions <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_Time_and_Expense_Entry_Instructions.pdf> for using our system. - Copy of our expense policy <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Expense_Policy.pdf>. - List of the most common expenses <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Expense_List.pdf> you can submit to MBO. - All the benefits of MBO Partners Referral Program <http://www.mbopartners.com/referral-program>. The next step is to schedule another time <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK> that works for you so we can do a walk-through of the business center and I can show you all the great features. I look forward to working with you! Thank you,Nicolette___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: ntaylor@mbopartners.com [mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com] Sent: Monday, October 08, 2012 11:41 AM To: frank_tanner@hotmail.com Subject: Your MBO account is now active Dear Frank, Welcome to MBO Partners! Now that your Business Center is active with us, I would like to schedule a time to walk through the MBO system with you, please review my calendar at my.timedriver.com <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK> to set up a convenient time for you. Should you have any additional questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me. Thank you,Nicolette TaylorBusiness Manager Direct: 703-793-6281 Toll Free: 800-556-0270MBO Partners13454 Sunrise Valley Dr., Ste 300Herndon, VA 20171]http://www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com%20>Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
